input.sentences: this picture of me in my wedding dress leaves me breathless .
i was so emotional having my father walk me down the aisle .
my parents have been my biggest supporters .
my future mother in law is one of the nicest individuals i know .
my husband to be and the officiant are patiently waiting for my arrival .
output.sentences: The bride posed for a wedding picture alone while her father waited by a pile of leaves.
As they began to walk down the aisle, the bride's father became emotional.
The bride was all smiles with her parents, as they were always her biggest supporters.
One of the nicest thoughts she had was that her mother in law was a huge support to her too.
Waiting patiently for his bride, the groom shared a few words with the officiant about his excitement.
